name: Sly Fox
description:
The Game

Foxes are main predators for ducks. They usually hunt down eggs and ducklings. Try not to be spotted by the ducks while you hide in bushes in this stealth-game.

Be patient, watch the enemies path, avoid traps and hunters or you'll get an instant death. Ducks aren't a big threat but you'll get a better score if you manage to hide from them all.

Entirely made in 9 days for the #UntitledGameJam 37, the theme was "Ducks".

Soundtrack - Dances and Dames by Kevin MacLeod.

Controls

Left arrow - move left;
Right arrow - move right;
Space - jump;
P - pause;
R - restart;

Hide in bushes to avoid the sight of ducks and hunters. Eat the eggs (and the ducklings for a better score), then hide again to complete the level.

Softwares

  • Game Engine - Game Maker Studio 2;
  • Graphic Design - Adobe Illustrator, Paint.NET;
  • Sound Design - Adobe Audition, Bfxr.

! WARNINGS !

Main issues that still needs to be fixed are:

  • The P - PAUSE and R - RESTART aren't explained in-game, but you can always press P to pause and R to restart the current level;
  • Game starts in full-screen and can't be re-sized to small;
  • The jump animation, when landing, glitch a bit and I'm losing my mind over this so it is not yet fixed;
  • No save mechanic: if you close your browser you have to play the entire game from the beginning;
  • There are only 4 levels (planning to make at least 10) and the ending screen is quite unpleasant, I'm sorry.

PROUDLY MADE IN ITALY BY ZENO BIANCHINI AND WOLF GAMES
